name: Stask - An App to Assist Students with Task Progress
description: Stask is a task management application designed for students who struggle to manage their numerous homework assignments. The app features an intuitive interface that helps users quickly identify which task to start with, thereby lowering the barrier to beginning their assignments. Additionally, it allows students to compete with friends who have been assigned the same tasks, encouraging them to start working on their assignments earlier.
